        long getWorkTimeBetweenDates(@Nonnull
                             java.util.Date start,
                             @Nonnull
                             java.util.Date finish)
                      throws com.jibrok.jira.plugins.timeinstatus.calendar.exception.CalendarException
        Counts time according to a schedule between dates. Uses calendar time zone or system default time zone for default calendar.

        return time in seconds.

        Throws:
        com.jibrok.jira.plugins.timeinstatus.calendar.exception.CalendarException

      • addWorkTime

        java.util.Date addWorkTime(@Nonnull
                           java.util.Date date,
                           long afterSeconds)
                    throws com.jibrok.jira.plugins.timeinstatus.calendar.exception.CalendarException
        Returns the new date according to the schedule. To the specified date adds "afterSeconds" working time. Uses calendar time zone or system default time zone for default calendar.
        Throws:
        com.jibrok.jira.plugins.timeinstatus.calendar.exception.CalendarException
